funnels.description: Tracks the basic user registration process, from starting the signup form to successful completion.
drop_off_risks: Lack of clear value proposition on the signup page

funnels.description: This funnel tracks a new user from creation, through an onboarding quiz, to viewing a paywall and successfully making a purchase.
drop_off_risks: Users may not start or complete the onboarding quiz
The transition from the quiz to the paywall could be jarring
Pricing on the paywall may be a significant barrier

funnels.description: This funnel is common in FinTech or other regulated industries, tracking the user's journey through Know-Your-Customer (KYC) identity verification steps.
steps: Clicked Membership Type Card on Homepage
drop_off_risks: Lack of trust or clarity about why KYC is needed
Friction in uploading documents or filling out information
Technical failures with the verification process

funnels.description: Tracks the core loop of a product: adding an item and then performing a key value-driving action on it. This is a measure of user activation.
drop_off_risks: Users add a plant but don't understand how or why to perform care actions
Notifications or reminders to perform care are ineffective

funnels.description: A retention-focused funnel that tracks users from purchasing a subscription to canceling it. This is used to analyze churn behavior.
drop_off_risks: This funnel measures the 'drop-off' from the entire product value prop
